original_text: Support was slow and the app kept crashing on my Android phone. Refund took two weeks.
Loved the battery life; finished a full day with 20% left. Camera quality is decent for the price.
The checkout failed three times before my order went through, very frustrating experience.
UI is clean and intuitive; onboarding flow is smooth and helpful.
Shipping was delayed and nobody replied to my emails for days; not happy with the service.
